metadata.description: Irish traditions and culture conversation for third-class

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: 你好! 我是小美。让我们学习如何谈论爱尔兰传统。

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: Say: 'I would like to learn more about Irish traditions'

transcript.speaker: child
transcript.content: I would like to learn more about Irish traditions and festivals.

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: 太棒了! That shows wonderful curiosity about Irish culture!

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: You can also say: 'Irish music is very beautiful'

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: 好棒! You appreciate different cultures beautifully!
